title: Website Portfolio Site
content:
Please help me identify the font used on this website

[http://jamesmh.net/1447/films](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415112616/http:/jamesmh.net/1447/films "http://jamesmh.net/1447/films")

Much appreciated.

Font: 

 Brandon Grotesque, Proxima Nova, Futura 

Solved By: 

 [Frode Bo Helland](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415112616/http:/typophile.com/user/17101 "View user profile.")
author: ainapore69

comments.content: A little bit Brandon Grotesque, some Proxima Nova and what appears to be Futura in the logotype.
